1.author: Napoleon Hill
1.phrase: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.

2.author: Vincent Van Gogh
2.phrase: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.

4.author: The Great Kahli
4.phrase: It's the small things that will make you successful.

5.author: Jackie Chan
5.phrase: I do small things. I try to do good things every day.

6.author: Napoleon Hill
6.phrase: I try to work on the small things.
